Package com.codingchili.core.storage

Class Query<Value extends Storable>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.codingchili.core.storage.Query<Value>
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    QueryBuilder<Value>
    public class Query<Value extends Storable>
extends java.lang.Object
implements QueryBuilder<Value>
    Provides the ability to create a query without an existing storage.

    Can be used to create reusable queries and string based/serializable queries.

    If the query is to be executed the #must be set or an exception will be thrown.

        public Query<Value> matches​(java.lang.String regex)
        Description copied from interface: QueryBuilder
        Checks if the given attribute matches the given regex. Be careful when passing user input to this method. No complexity restrictions are applied. To pass user input use equals instead. If a query can use any non-regex constraint, it is recommended to use that instead.
        Specified by:
